response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that is truly a game-changer and holds immense value to you. This product, tailored specifically to meet your needs and aspirations, is priced at $950,000. My goal is to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction, and I believe this offer strikes a fair balance. Please let me know if you require any further information or clarification about the product, and I would be more than happy to provide it. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
